physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pansystolic murmur at the apex radiating posteriorly up to the midscapular line. Cardiothoracic ratio of 60% to 65% and pulmonary hilar congestion observed on chest radiography. Transthoracic and transesophageal echocardiogram showed an aneurysm of the anterior mitral leaflet causing moderate to severe mitral regurgitation.
